name: OomaSmartCam
0:
”Alexa, ask Ooma SmartCam to turn on privacy mode”
”Alexa, ask Ooma SmartCam to turn off privacy mode”
”Alexa, open Ooma SmartCam”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ooma smart cam
des:
Ooma SmartCam allows you quickly switch privacy mode ON and OFF. 

To initiate the skill, say "Alexa, use Ooma Smart Cam" or "Alexa, open Ooma Smart Cam". 
Once inside the skill, just use one of these commands:
- "turn ON privacy mode"
- "turn OFF privacy mode"

The skill is compatible with both generations of our cameras: 
-generation 1 (known as Ooma Butterfleye) 
-generation 2 (known as Ooma Smart Cam)

More features are coming soon. Please stay tuned. Reach out to us if you have questions or suggestions.
